title: Tech baseball reveals promotions for Miami home series - VT hokiesports.com
content: Tech baseball reveals promotions for Miami home series  VT hokiesports.com
description: On the eve of hosting a top-25 series at English Field at Atlantic Union Bank Park, the No. 21 Virginia Tech baseball team is excited to announce promotions and gameday experience elements fans can expect when attending the Hokies' three games against No. 2 Miami between Thursday, April 14, and Saturday, April 16.
